title: Folklore OST
description:
Description: 
Folklore (FolksSoul in the Japanese version) is an adventure/role-playing game for the Playstation 3 which features an amazing soundtrack, composed by Kenji Kawai, Shinji Hosoe, Ayako Saso, and Hiroto Saitoh. The files are in MP3-format, at 320 kbit/s variable bitrate - all properly labelled and sorted.

Disclaimer: 
I wasn't able to find this soundtrack as a torrent anywhere, so once I managed to get a hold of it via another site, I figured I might as well upload it here. It says in the description that #gamemp3s is responsible for the coding, so all credit go out to them.

Track listing:

   1. The Beginning of the Journey
   2. A Mysterious Door
   3. The Netherworld
   4. Solitude
   5. Resolution
   6. Awakening
   7. Rumbling
   8. Mystery
   9. The Faery Waltz
  10. Crisis
  11. Escaping the Myth
  12. Where the Flowers are Scattered
  13. A Voice from the Past
  14. Resurfacing Past
  15. Speaking With the Dead
  16. Endless Battlefield
  17. Menace
  18. Avalon

Disc 2

   1. Ancient Breath
   2. An Undertaking
   3. Impact
   4. Visited Tragedy
   5. Land of the Gods
   6. An Arranged History

   9. Sorrow
  10. Distant Memories
  11. The Forgotten Village
  12. IRISH LULLABY
  13. DANNY BOY

Disc 3

  13. Sovereign Vessel

  15. Transfiguration

  18. Collapse
  19. Where the Soul Goes
